name: Beebuilder

abilities.name: Honey Gather
abilities.desc: The possessor may gather Honey during a battle. The possessor will consume Honey when its HP falls below 50%. Honey will recover 20% of the user's HP.

abilities.name: Hustle (Secret)
abilities.desc: Boosts the possessor's Attack stat, but lowers its accuracy.

description: Beebuilder are the lower tier of their species who are assigned to collect materials, food and build nest. They have a small protective armour made from clay to help them with the heavy duties. Their small arms are able to carry things 10 times heavier than their bodies' mass.
